akn:section.akn:heading: Appointment of Special Coordinator for water policy negotiations and water resources policy

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2686a. Appointment of Special Coordinator for water policy negotiations and water resources policy(a) DesignationThe Secretary of State shall designate a Special Coordinator—(1) to coordinate the United States Government response to international water resource disputes and needs;
(2) to represent the United States Government, whenever appropriate, in multilateral fora in discussions concerning access to fresh water; and
(3) to formulate United States policy to assist in the resolution of international problems posed by the lack of fresh water supplies.
(b) Other responsibilitiesThe individual designated under subsection (a) may carry out the functions of subsection (a) in addition to other assigned responsibilities.
(Pub. L. 102–138, title I, § 180, Oct. 28, 1991, 105 Stat. 682.)
